Oxaliplatin administer dose 130 mg/ m2 120 minute day 1 cycle , follow standard antiemetic premedications . 21 day cycle . For first cycle , trastuzumab administer oxaliplatin ; however subsequent cycle , oxaliplatin infuse prior trastuzumab
